post.text:
The U.S. presidency isn't an entry-level job.

How Hillary's time as our secretary of state shows she's ready:

comment.author: Angela
comment.text: Her time as Secretary of State by funelling $6 billion into her own hands and those of her cronies?

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: Did you watch the video??? She is much more qualified than he is. What did he do for us in the time she was Secretary of State? I'll tell you, lining his Chinese pockets with money by cheating small businesses and bilking money from people for his fake university!

replies.author: Angela
replies.text: I prefer Johnson, not trump don't make assumptions
